111.content:
Proloue -
It had already been 4 months since her parents finalized the divorce. Although she was already 18 years old she still didn't know how to cope with her family breaking apart. She saw her dad everyday or at least every other day when the divorce initially happened. Now, Josie would be lucky to see her father once a week. In addition to her fathers absence her mother had become more irritable and emotionally distant from her and her sister. All this change was too much for Josie. Around a month ago she had started wetting the bed. She managed to hide her accidents from her family most of the time, and other times she was not as sneaky as she would have liked to have been. In total Josie had been caught with a wet bed 6 times in the last month. Luckily no one had noticed the other couple dozen times, but 6 seemed to be enough to get on her mothers bad side. Her room was beginning to smell of stale urine, her mattress was on its way out along with her box frame, and all those loads of laundry were starting to take there toll on the washer. The night before Josies mother had warned her that if she wets the bed one more time they would have a serious talk.

*Josie stirred in her sleep before waking up to an all to familiar feeling. She checks her phone. It was 8 am. She then reaches down to feel her athletic shorts to confirm what she already knew to be the case.*
"Fuck my life..."
*She springs out of bed knowing that her mother would be coming in to make sure she was up any minute. There wasn't much time to change her sheets but she figured she could cover her blanket over her sheets and change before her mother came in. The feeling of panic and shame set in as time race against her. She dashed to her drawer before sliding down her shorts and.... before she could do anything else her bedroom door swung open.

Who was it?

113.content:
So, little Josie has a diaper fetish. How will this turn out?

** Bing** * Josie is snapped out of her day dream by a snapchat notification. She opens the message up to see her friend Megan posing with her face toward the bus window. She sends her a few heart emojis before placing her phone back into her pocket and waiting alone at the bus stop. It was still fairly early in the morning so not many people were up let a lone out on the streets. Josie took this as her opportunity to pull the hem of her shorts out and adjust the waistband of her pampers diaper. What had been a fantasy of hers for so long has become a reality. She closed her eyes and took a few deep breaths, quitely repeating to herself "You can do this...You can do this." *

** Coughs**

Josie opens her eyes and jumps a bit at the realization that she wasn't alone at the bus stop anymore. "G-Good morning David. Morning Mike" She meekly smiled at the two freshmen twins she saw each morning before school. Mike simply gives her a head nod and David doesn't look away from his phone as the bus pulls up. All three board the bus before the doors shut and they drive away. Josies ears started burning at the sound of her pampers crinkling with every step as she made her way to the back of the bus where Megan was waiting for her. Although the no one else could hear Josies anxiety was at a 10 and being surrounded by people was both giving her the rush she was looking for and giving her second thoughts. She made her way through the crowded seats of high school students talking, yelling, and playing on their phones before arriving next to Megan. Once she realized the attention was not on her she started calming down.

After 5 minutes of talking with Megan the bus pulled into the school parking lot. As they all got off Josie wound up tripping over her own feet and briefly falling before springing back up. She udjusts her short tight shirt and shorts making sure she wasn't exposed when all of a sudden.
